name: The Nexus of Higher Studies: Opportunities Abroad
description: Learn about opportunities for higher studies abroad in this two-day workshop.
venue: NS Lab, 2nd Floor, C Block, SRM IST VDP

name: INVENTUS
description: Showcase your innovation in our Hackathon, where your final project doesn't just win but earns a patent. Turn your groundbreaking ideas into intellectual property that makes an impact. Collaborate, create, and leave with a project that could shape the future.
fee: â‚¹180/- for a team of 3 participants
rules: The hackathon is open to all students. Participants can join individually or form teams of up to 4 members. Registration is required before the deadline.
Participants must register online, submitting team names and member details. Any team member changes after registration must be communicated to the organizers.
The hackathon lasts 12 hours, with a theme announced at the start. Participants must develop projects based on the theme and present them to judges.
Integrity and honesty are required. Plagiarism, copying code, or unauthorized assistance will lead to immediate disqualification.
All projects must be submitted within the designated time frame through the provided platform. Functional projects meeting specified requirements are necessary for evaluation.
Projects will be evaluated on innovation, functionality, technical implementation, potential impact, and the quality of the presentation.
The winning project may be eligible for a patent, and top teams will receive cash prizes. All participants will get certificates of participation.
Teams can be disqualified for submitting copied code, disruptive behavior, or violating any event rules. Participants must bring their own hardware and adhere to the schedule.
